oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Moon is created from a long white wing-feather of the Ostrich. After |kaggen (the Mantis) breaks the eland's gall and it blinds him, he crawls, feeling his way to the place of the Ostrich, where he finds a feather. He throws it into the sky so that it may become the Moon and light the ground for him to see in the darkness.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: |kaggen (the Mantis) and the Moon: creation of the latter (version 2)
